Here we demonstrate the use of the `pecotmr` package to perform
a version of colocalization, TWAS and MR between a pair of molecular QTL and GWAS.

## Set up your environment

Load the `pecotmr` package.

```{r load-pkgs}
library(pecotmr)
```
